body: Circle was hitting errors which I was not getting locally. The issue stemmed from using `.find(CustomEl)` where CustomEl was a stateless functional component. I've switched over to targeting the element ID instead. Assuming Circle is happy with these changes, this PR should be good to go.
body_text: Circle was hitting errors which I was not getting locally. The issue stemmed from using .find(CustomEl) where CustomEl was a stateless functional component. I've switched over to targeting the element ID instead. Assuming Circle is happy with these changes, this PR should be good to go.
body_html: Circle was hitting errors which I was not getting locally. The issue stemmed from using .find(CustomEl) where CustomEl was a stateless functional component. I've switched over to targeting the element ID instead. Assuming Circle is happy with these changes, this PR should be good to go.
